title: Remove reopenReaders attribute from ref guide
description:
The index config documentation in ref guide [1] describes an attribute called reopenReaders which is not supported since 4x. 

[1] - http://lucene.apache.org/solr/guide/7_2/indexconfig-in-solrconfig.html#other-indexing-settings
